about_the_game:
Neon-Doomer 85' is a spin-off game to the original Doomer project.

Dive into the life of a retrowave doomer for a while. Just click the TV screen to control your virtual car, the design of which is inspired by classic '80s automobiles and the vivid imagination of the creators. Each click brings you closer to new levels and unlocks unique references to iconic cultural events of the past.

Features:

  • Click on the car to score points and reach new levels.

  • Use earned points to buy yourself a new car from a vast car collection available in the game.

  • Pay attention to your surroundings; the doomer's room has a life of its own, so your car might not be the only interactive element.

  • Collect your unique set of retrowave artifacts, referencing classic movies, music, and video games from the '80s, '90s, and 2000s.

  • Enjoy a special retrowave soundtrack that immerses you in an atmosphere of nostalgia and retrofuturism.

  • Experience neon lights, futuristic cityscapes, and '80s style.

  • Enjoy easy and intuitive clicker gameplay.

Join the retro-doomer movement, travel futuristic tracks, and enjoy the atmosphere of Neon Doomer '85. Let each click bring you closer to a retro-future dream full of neon, music, and solitude!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Immerse yourself in neon lights, retrowave music, and futuristic cars of Neon Doomer '85. Become part of the doomer movement living in the '80s style, enjoying the aesthetics of retro-futurism and tranquil solitude.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Turkish, Japanese
